import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import './Navbar.css'; const Navbar = () => { const [isMenuOpen, setIsMenuOpen] = useState(false); const toggleMenu = () => { setIsMenuOpen(!isMenuOpen); }; return (
